ext_description.message: Download and save videos from all sites EXCEPT YouTube.

not_connected.message: The extension is not connected on this page

not_found.message: There are no video files found on this page yet

not_founded.message: If the file you want is not in the list, try to play it.

youtube_blocked.message: Google Chrome policy does not allow downloading streaming content directly from YouTube! Try to find this video on another site
